title: Hunt of the Blood Moon...Erm..
body:
I like the idea of the game mode, don't get me wrong, but...

Is there any reason Jhin and Twisted Fate are banned from it?

I get that neither of these champions are assassins or "aggressive divers", whatever the hell that means, but neither are Kennen or Yasuo and both of those champions are enabled. 

If this is a Blood Moon event, every Blood Moon champ should participate in it.

replies.body: Aggressive divers are those that want to get up in your face, Kennen and Yasuo are very good at that.
Jhin and TF wouldn't have the mobility to survive a mode like this I presume.

There are no minions, so Yas barely has any mobility himself and he's still allowed in. Kennen has a speed boost, but that's quite a step down from all the gap closers running around

Also Evelyn is in the mode. Jhin is more mobile than Evelyn.

> [{quoted}](name=The Yetii Rider,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O8MGxrPv,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-01T23:12:26.598+0000)
>
> There are no minions, so Yas barely has any mobility himself and he's still allowed in. Kennen has a speed boost, but that's quite a step down from all the gap closers running around
> 
> Also Evelyn is in the mode. Jhin is more mobile than Evelyn.

how is he more mobile than eve?

> [{quoted}](name=Dreshawn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O8MGxrPv,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-02-04T20:11:31.370+0000)
>
> how is he more mobile than eve?

Eve has her W, which breaks her Stealth so she usually uses it after she's closed a gap do that she doesn't reveal herself over a ward. 

Jhin has a speed boost every 4th shot, crit and W.
Is Shen not allowed in?  What about Zilean?

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O8MGxrPv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-01T21:24:01.203+0000)
>
> Is Shen not allowed in?  What about Zilean?

Good point. I really don't understand why certain champs are allowed in and not others.
from what i understand about, they only wanted champs capable of giving players that "jump scare" old rengar was so proficient at
